about_the_game:
Lone Star Dandelion is a side-scrolling action shooter with the following content;
——3 protagonists with full personality and easy to operate, they are "Dandelion", "The King of Embers", and "All of Grass, Gods and Trees"
Introduction to Character Features
Dandelion - A person who possesses the power of both the Protoss and the Demon Race. Able to draw "Star Array" and "Rainbow Sun Array" respectively, and press the arrow keys to operate "Star Array" and "Rainbow Sun Array" to conduct coordinated attacks during the attack. Dandelion can also teleport to the position of "Star Array" or "Rainbow Sun Array", so that it can move very flexibly. When the melee attack collides with the enemy's attack, the bad news is that the dandelion's attack will be bounced back, and the good news is that you can double-click the basic attack button to perform a powerful counterattack while the dandelion's attack is bounced back. In addition, Dandelion can also use a series of special skill actions such as Dimension Slash, Flying Kick, and Slide Shovel.
Embers King - a race composed of ash from top to bottom, in addition to ordinary combos, you can also use "stored combos" that can be released to strengthen the next skill release within a certain range (the second, The 3-stage combo effect hits the enemy can provide recovery for the ember king), the stored action effect will be released at one time after successfully blocking the counterattack enemy, with almost no upper limit of explosive power. At the same time, the Embers King can also perform a savage straight dash.
Grass, God and Tree - A character that uses only five buttons of W, S, A, D, and Space, and has two combat systems of fighting and elemental response, abandoning complicated redundant buttons and returning to the original intention of rubbing buttons. Not any two elements can be mixed, and only elements with the same element period and close positions can trigger reactions to each other to produce effects. At the same time, the specific simplified arrow key command to connect Space to make moves can also use a good combo. Flexible control of your grass sword β, it can resist the enemy's long-range attack for you, and use the enemy's attack to automatically counterattack. You can even add a key command in the process of using a special move to teleport to the position of the grass sword beta to complete the combo.
In short, whether you can play the role 1000% or not depends on your own operations and strategies.

- Combat with exciting elements such as combo, block counterattack, slingshot counterattack, evasion, and high-speed movement.
- Refreshing sense of operation
——A plot story with lesbian elements in a grand world view dominated by female protagonists.
——There is no boring leveling process, the protagonist will become stronger as the level is cleared
------
---
-----
Using Songs：“風ふわり”“joirney (Sound Demo)”“ 残された世界　-for a long time-”“the fall”
source：SLOS [ ]
background [ ]
Copyrights, SLOS/background
Thanks for the music provided by the above website
detailed_description:
Lone Star Dandelion is a side-scrolling action shooter with the following content;
——3 protagonists with full personality and easy to operate, they are "Dandelion", "The King of Embers", and "All of Grass, Gods and Trees"
Introduction to Character Features
Dandelion - A person who possesses the power of both the Protoss and the Demon Race. Able to draw "Star Array" and "Rainbow Sun Array" respectively, and press the arrow keys to operate "Star Array" and "Rainbow Sun Array" to conduct coordinated attacks during the attack. Dandelion can also teleport to the position of "Star Array" or "Rainbow Sun Array", so that it can move very flexibly. When the melee attack collides with the enemy's attack, the bad news is that the dandelion's attack will be bounced back, and the good news is that you can double-click the basic attack button to perform a powerful counterattack while the dandelion's attack is bounced back. Grass, God and Tree - A character that uses only five buttons of W, S, A, D, and Space, and has two combat systems of fighting and elemental response, abandoning complicated redundant buttons and returning to the original intention of rubbing buttons. Not any two elements can be mixed, and only elements with the same element period and close positions can trigger reactions to each other to produce effects. At the same time, the specific simplified arrow key command to connect Space to make moves can also use a good combo. Flexible control of your grass sword β, it can resist the enemy's long-range attack for you, and use the enemy's attack to automatically counterattack. You can even add a key command in the process of using a special move to teleport to the position of the grass sword beta to complete the combo.

movies.name: 孤星蒲公英 演示（旧的）
孤星蒲公英 飞行射击演示

name: 孤星蒲公英

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 一款女性主角的魔幻架空世界的高速横版动作射击游戏。 连击、射击、闪避、时停、弹刀、反击、魔法、抽卡……都是战斗的一部分 用快速的反应和正确的决策击败敌人，虽然偶尔也会有很强的敌人挡在你面前，但是这也不过是复仇之路上一个小小的障碍，我相信你。
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
